common.description: Desmos block explorer is powered by Big Dipper. Big Dipper is an open-source block explorer and token management tool serving over 10 proof-of-stake blockchains. It has been forked more than 100 times on GitHub and has served audiences from 140 countries and regions.
message_contents.txMsgSetDefaultExternal: <0>{{signer}}</0> set a new default external address to <1>{{target}}</1>
message_contents.txMsgMovePost: <0>{{owner}}</0> moved a post with ID <1>{{post_id}}</1> from <2>{{subspace_id}}</2> to <3>{{target_subspace_id}}</3> subspace
message_contents.txMsgRequestPostOwnerTr: <0>{{sender}}</0> requested to transfer a post <1>{{post_id}}</1> ownership to <2>{{receiver}}</2> in <3>{{subspace_id}}</3> subspace
message_contents.txMsgCancelPostOwnerTra: <0>{{sender}}</0> cancelled owner transfer request for a post with ID <1>{{post_id}}</1> in <2>{{subspace_id}}</2> subspace
message_contents.txMsgAcceptPostOwnerTra: <0>{{receiver}}</0> accepted owner transfer request for a post with ID <1>{{post_id}}</1> in <2>{{subspace_id}}</2> subspace
message_contents.txMsgRefusePostOwnerTra: <0>{{receiver}}</0> refused owner transfer request for a post with ID <1>{{post_id}}</1> in <2>{{subspace_id}}</2> subspace
message_contents.txMsgAddPostAttachment: <0>{{editor}}</0> added an attachment to a post
message_contents.txMsgRemovePostAttachme: <0>{{editor}}</0> removed an attachment to a post
message_contents.txMsgAddReaction: <0>{{user}}</0> added a reaction to a post
message_contents.txMsgRemoveReaction: <0>{{user}}</0> removed a reaction to a post
message_contents.txMsgAddRegisteredReact: <0>{{user}}</0> added a registered reaction <1>{{displayValue}}</1> to a post
message_contents.txMsgEditRegisteredReac: <0>{{user}}</0> edited a registered reaction to <1>{{displayValue}}</1> on a post
message_contents.txMsgAddReason: <0>{{signer}}</0> added a reason titled <1>{{title}}</1> to a subspace
message_contents.txMsgCreateSubspace: <0>{{creator}}</0> created a subspace with the description <1>{{description}}</1>
message_contents.txMsgEditSubspace: <0>{{creator}}</0> edited a subspace with the new description <1>{{description}}</1>
message_contents.txMsgCreateSection: <0>{{creator}}</0> created a section with the name <1>{{name}}</1>
message_contents.txMsgMoveSection: <0>{{signer}}</0> moved a section to another parent
message_contents.txMsgCreateUserGroup: <0>{{creator}}</0> created a user group with the name <1>{{name}}</1>
message_contents.txMsgEditUserGroup: <0>{{signer}}</0> edited a user group with the new description <1>{{description}}</1>
message_contents.txMsgSetUserGroupPermis: <0>{{signer}}</0> set the permissions of a user group
